description: Success. (Rakuten returns error codes inside XML/JSON body even on HTTP 200.)
action: Always parse the body error code â€” HTTP 200 does not guarantee success.

description: Required parameter is missing or has an invalid value.
action: Check the parameter listed in the error message. Do not retry.

description: Item or order not found for the given identifier.
action: Verify the item manage number or order number. Dead-letter if data came from Rakuten's own API.

description: The operation is not permitted for the current state (e.g. updating a cancelled order).
action: Check the current state of the resource before attempting state-changing operations.

description: Authentication failed. Invalid ServiceSecret or LicenseKey.
action: Verify RAKUTEN_SERVICE_SECRET and RAKUTEN_LICENSE_KEY. Check Base64 encoding and ESA prefix.

description: The shop does not have access to this API service.
action: Contact Rakuten Partner support to enable the required API service for the shop.

description: Request quota exceeded for this service.
action: Apply exponential backoff. Reduce call frequency and batch requests.

description: Rakuten server error. May indicate throttling (Rakuten sometimes returns 500 instead of 429).
action: Check error message. If 'over quota' appears, treat as throttling. Otherwise, retry with backoff up to 5 times.
Rakuten performs scheduled maintenance. Retry after the maintenance window. Check RMS for maintenance notices.

description: Genre (category) ID is invalid or does not accept products.
action: Use the Navigation API (getGenreInformation) to find valid leaf genre IDs before inserting products.

description: A required item attribute for the genre is missing.
action: Fetch genre-specific required attributes and ensure all are present in the item data.
